actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Agriculture.

official_title: A bill to amend Public Law 566, Watershed Protection and Flood Prevention Act, as amended to remove the limitation on any single loan or advancement for watershed works of improvement.

summary.text: Removes the present $5,000,000 limitation on the amount of any single loan or advancement for watershed works of improvement under the Watershed Protection and Flood Prevention Act.

titles.title: A bill to amend Public Law 566, Watershed Protection and Flood Prevention Act, as amended to remove the limitation on any single loan or advancement for watershed works of improvement.
